CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the crystal structures of blend films of the copolymers with PC71BM were examined by XRD , the PTATDPP / PC71BM blend had strong and intense ( 100 ) diffraction while the PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend showed weak and broad ( 100 ) diffraction ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PTATDPP      |
| PTAFDPP      |
| PC71BM       |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "the copolymers" in the beginning, but it does not provide enough context to determine which specific copolymers are being referred to. Therefore, it is not included in the table as a material name entity. The rest of the entities in the paragraph, PTATDPP, PTAFDPP, and PC71BM, are clearly identified as material names.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the crystal structures of blend films of the copolymers with PC71BM were examined by XRD , the PTATDPP / PC71BM blend had strong and intense ( 100 ) diffraction while the PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend showed weak and broad ( 100 ) diffraction ( Fig.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystal structures of blend films |
| PTATDPP / PC71BM blend |
| PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend |
| (100) diffraction |
| strong and intense (100) diffraction |
| weak and broad (100) diffraction |
| XRD |
| Fig. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

| Property Name |
| --- |

| (100) diffraction |

| weak and broad (100) diffraction |

Note: XRD and Fig. are not material properties, but rather techniques used to examine material properties. Therefore, they have been removed from the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the crystal structures of blend films of the copolymers with PC71BM were examined by XRD , the PTATDPP / PC71BM blend had strong and intense ( 100 ) diffraction while the PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend showed weak and broad ( 100 ) diffraction ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| PTATDPP / PC71BM blend   |
| PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend   |
| (100) diffraction of PTATDPP / PC71BM blend |
| (100) diffraction of PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend |
| strong and intense (for PTATDPP / PC71BM blend) |
| weak and broad (for PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|-------------------------|
| (100) diffraction of PTATDPP / PC71BM blend |
| (100) diffraction of PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend |
| strong and intense (for PTATDPP / PC71BM blend) |
| weak and broad (for PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend) |

Explanation:
The paragraph is about the examination of crystal structures of blend films of copolymers with PC71BM using XRD. The properties mentioned in the paragraph are related to the diffraction patterns of the two different blends (PTATDPP / PC71BM and PTAFDPP / PC71BM). Therefore, the valid entities are the diffraction patterns and their respective intensities (strong and intense for PTATDPP / PC71BM blend and weak and broad for PTAFDPP / PC71BM blend).
